bns:Component.folderFullPath: Flexport/01 Demand_Ecosystem/2_Generics/Generic ASN - v2/Partner Process/Infor Nexus
bns:Component.name: Partner - Infor Nexus - EDI 856

errorMessage.content: SKU information missing on digitized CI.
One or more PO Line Item Numbers is missing from the far-right column of the CI digitization.

One or more of the following details are missing for the shipper entity listed in the Involved Parties: Shipper Name, Ref ID, Address1, City and Country Code, UNLOCODE. Check that the shipper entity has both a physical location address and a legal entity address for its Core Network location.

One or more of the following details are missing for the consignee entity listed in the Involved Parties: Consignee Name, Ref ID, Address1, City and Country Code, UNLOCODE. Check that the consignee entity has both a physical location address and a legal entity address for its Core Network location.
Carrier Details (Carrier Name, Ref ID) are Empty.

One or more of the following details are missing for the broker/importer of record entity listed in the Involved Parties: Broker/Importer of Record Name, Ref ID, Address1, City and Country Code, UNLOCODE.
One or more of the following details are missing for the Origin Address selected in the Route Details: Origin Location UNLOCODE, City and Country Code.
One or more of the following details are missing for the POL selected in the Route Details: POL Location UNLOCODE, City and Country Code.
One or more of the following details are missing for the POD selected in the Route Details: POD Location UNLOCODE, City and Country Code.
One or more of the following details are missing for the Destination Address selected in the Route Details: Destination Location UNLOCODE, City and Country Code.
Estimated Delivery Date is Empty.
The Estimated Departure Date is Empty.
The Estimated Arrival Date is Empty.

rule.name: Quantity and Weight Details are Empty?

errorMessage.content: Cargo Details (Quantity, Weight, and Volume) are Empty or the cargo totals remain in "Planned" status instead of "Shipped".
Equipment Details (Container Number for Ocean, Flight Number for Air) are Empty.
Container Seal Number is Empty.
One or more PO Numbers are missing from the digitized CI.
Product Name is Empty.
Commercial Invoice Number is not entered in the CI digitization for one or more CI's.
Airway Bill Number is Empty.
Houses Bill of Lading Number is Empty.

Vessel/Flight Details are Empty. In the Route Details, the carrier SCAC, vessel name, and voyage number must be entered for each ocean leg, and the airline name and flight number must be entered for each air leg.
Shipped Quantity is Empty.
Master Bill of Lading Number is Empty.

The SKU field on the digitized CI should only contain the SKU number, but on one or more of the digitized CI's the SKU field has both the SKU number and the Product Description entered. Please ask Data Services to amend this to include only the SKU number and then reprocess the ASN.

errorMessage.content: SKU information missing on digitized CI.
One or more PO Line Item Numbers is missing from the far-right column of the CI digitization.

One or more of the following details are missing for the shipper entity listed in the Involved Parties: Shipper Name, Ref ID, Address1, City and Country Code, UNLOCODE. Check that the shipper entity has both a physical location address and a legal entity address for its Core Network location.

One or more of the following details are missing for the consignee entity listed in the Involved Parties: Consignee Name, Ref ID, Address1, City and Country Code, UNLOCODE. Check that the consignee entity has both a physical location address and a legal entity address for its Core Network location.
Carrier Details (Carrier Name, Ref ID) are Empty.

One or more of the following details are missing for the broker/importer of record entity listed in the Involved Parties: Broker/Importer of Record Name, Ref ID, Address1, City and Country Code, UNLOCODE.
One or more of the following details are missing for the Origin Address selected in the Route Details: Origin Location UNLOCODE, City and Country Code.

rule.name: Quantity and Weight Details are Empty?

errorMessage.content: Cargo Details (Quantity, Weight, and Volume) are Empty or the cargo totals remain in "Planned" status instead of "Shipped".

Shipment Details (Container Number for Ocean, HAWB for Air) are missing. For ocean shipments, the container number must be added in the Containers section,. For air shipments, the HAWB must be entered In the AWB section.
Container Seal Number is Empty.
One or more PO Numbers are missing from the digitized CI.
Product Name is Empty.
Commercial Invoice Number is not entered in the CI digitization for one or more CI's.
Airway Bill Number is Empty.
Houses Bill of Lading Number is Empty.

Shipment Details (Vessel Name for Ocean, IATA Code OR flight_number for Air) are missing. For ocean shipments, add the Vessel Name to the Route Details. For air shipments, add the Carrier and Flight Number to the Route Details.
Shipped Quantity is Empty.
Master Bill of Lading Number is Empty.

The SKU field on the digitized CI should only contain the SKU number, but on one or more of the digitized CI's the SKU field has both the SKU number and the Product Description entered. Please ask Data Services to amend this to include only the SKU number and then reprocess the ASN.
